channel.title: A Few Commands
channel.description:
does anybody have the following commands? (i could go look but i was hoping somebody here had it first. :P)
i need:
ipban
the ::mod ::admin ::demod ::deadmin(only able to do it by name not Rights)
and unban if possible?
thanks :)
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2007, 01:59:13 AM[/size][hr]so many view but nobody has em? :(

item.title: A Few Commands
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

[quote=“ZeroFreeze, post:6, topic:147245”]http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

Why not learn java and do these simple things yourself instead of asking people to make things for you?[/quote]
why not have someone delete the help section? oh? mmkay i know about java obviously, i just cant be bothered to make a command. most people here already have them made so i figured i’d get off of these people. thanks ;)?

also yes, ethan is right. i tried to make it myself, but got annoyed so i came here, figured i was wasting my time.

Read full topic

item.title: A Few Commands
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“newadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
else if(command.startsWith(“newmod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“nomod”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
[/code]
enjoy (demod = mod or adminship done

Read full topic
